issue.title: [SQLSERVER] : can't save relation as a search criteria
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Erreur
L'enregistrement a échoué avec l'erreur suivante : [Microsoft][SQL Server Native Client 11.0][SQL Server]Conversion failed when converting the varchar value '((0))' to data type tinyint.SQL=UPDATE [sdi_sdi_relation] SET [guid]='672d30ce-f3bb-a014-4552-95e87043dbc7',[alias]='metadatastandardname',[created_by]='640',[created]='2015-06-08 10:54:33',[modified_by]='640',[modified]='2015-06-08 10:54:33',[ordering]='9',[state]='1',[checked_out]='640',[checked_out_time]='2015-06-08 10:54:19',[name]='metadataStandardName',[description]='',[parent_id]='1',[attributechild_id]='8',[classchild_id]=NULL,[lowerbound]='0',[upperbound]='1',[relationtype_id]=NULL,[rendertype_id]='5',[namespace_id]=NULL,[isocode]=NULL,[classassociation_id]=NULL,[issearchfilter]='1',[relationscope_id]='2',[editorrelationscope_id]='2',[childresourcetype_id]=NULL,[childtype_id]='2',[access]='1',[accessscope_limitation]='((0))' WHERE [id]='9'

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
